00010 #define __GLAZIERY_MENUBAR_H

00013 #define GLAZIERY_MENUBAR(variable, area, groupField) \
00014    MenuBar * variable; \
00015    if ((variable = new MenuBar) == NULL) \
00016       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00017    if (area != NULL) \
00018       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00019    if (groupField != NULL) \
00020       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable);
00021 
00022 #define GLAZIERY_MENUBAR_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py) \
00023    GLAZIERY_MENUBAR(variable, area, groupField) \
00024    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00025
